name: (1E)-N,N'-bis(4-methylphenyl)-2-[(4-methylphenyl)amino]ethanimidamide
source: Karthikeyan M.; Glen R.C.; Bender A. General melting point prediction based on a diverse compound dataset and artificial neural networks. J. Chem. Inf. Model.; 2005; 45(3); 581-3193
Reason: 1E-N,N'-bis(4-methylphenyl)-2-[(4-methylphenyl)amino]ethanimidamide has a complex structure with multiple functional groups that impact its melting point. The basic unit for comparison can be ethanimidamide, which has a melting point of -106.0 degrees Celsius. The methylphenyl group (C)cc1ccccc1 adds approximately +20 due to increasing the molecular weight and rigidity of the structure. The 4-methylphenyl group (C)cc1ccccc1 adds approximately +10 due to increasing the molecular weight and rigidity of the structure. The amino group (N) adds approximately +5 due to increasing the molecular weight and rigidity of the structure. The piperidine ring (N) adds approximately +20 due to increasing the molecular weight and rigidity of the structure. The methyl group (C) adds approximately +5 due to increasing the molecular weight and rigidity of the structure.
